attributes.action: Government and MPs must pay NHS and Health Care Worker more. 1% not enough
attributes.additional_details: Because the 1% offer is poor given the work done during the pandemic. Care staff too have been exceptional in their commitment. Government needs to think again and propose a better settlement to the Pay bodies and to the private sector.
attributes.background: To look again at the proposed increase of 1% for NHS staff. It does not recognise their work and commitment or danger of infection they faced. They should also look at extra pay for Care staff.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
